qas.question: What statement addressed the relationship of Italy to Greece in the Catholic church?
In what year was the Catholic-Orthodox joint declaration read?
In what city was the Catholic-Orthodox joint declaration read?
Who visited the Vatican in May of 1973 in an effort to negotiate Orthodox and Catholic relations?
How many times did Coptic Patriarch Shenouda III meet with Paul VI in 1973?

context: This was a significant step towards restoring communion between Rome and Constantinople. It produced the <a0_0>Catholic-Orthodox Joint declaration of 1965<a0_0/>, which was read out on 7 December <a1_0>1965<a1_0/>, simultaneously at a public meeting of the Second Vatican Council in <a2_0>Rome<a2_0/> and at a special ceremony in Istanbul. The declaration did not end the schism, but showed a desire for greater reconciliation between the two churches. In May 1973, the <a3_0>Coptic Patriarch Shenouda III<a3_0/> of Alexandria visited the Vatican, where he met <a4_0>three<a4_0/> times with Pope Paul VI. A common declaration and a joint Creed issued after the visit demonstrated that there are virtually no more[additional citation needed] theological discrepancies between the Coptic and Roman Catholic Churches.
